title: Marcus Borg - An Assortment of Books [mobi, pdf]
description:
Marcus J. Borg (March 11, 1942 Ã¢â‚¬â€œ January 21, 2015) was an American New Testament scholar, theologian and author. He was among the most widely known and influential voices in progressive Christianity. As a fellow of the Jesus Seminar Borg was a major figure in historical Jesus scholarship. He retired as Hundere Distinguished Professor of Religion and Culture at Oregon State University in 2007 and died eight years later at the age of 72, of idiopathic pulmonary fibrosis. 

I doubled up on a few titles by accident. Given the miniscule size of the files I trust that won't be a problem with anyone. Enjoy!
